name: Endless Monster House
description:
◎How To  mobile : swipe up down PC :  mouse click+drag up down

◎Hint ・Love meat, hate vegetable ・Watch out for holes ・not give up, if enemies come full ・Please treasure the cross ・You know that Shield is very strong. Use asset https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-dungeon-tileset
